titles.title: Data for American Jobs Act of 2023
Data for American Jobs Act of 2023
A bill to amend the Education Sciences Reform Act of 2002 and the Educational Technical Assistance Act of 2002 regarding career and technical education, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
